mapper.insert: insert into hw_plate_parent(plate_name, plate_belong, create_id,create_time,update_time) VALUES ( #{plateName}, #{plateBelong}, #{createId}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select:
select t1.id, t1.plate_belong, t1.create_time, t1.plate_name, t1.update_time, t2.id, t2.parent_id, t2.plate_name_son from hw_plate_parent t1 LEFT JOIN hw_plate_son t2 ON t1.id = t2.parent_id
where 1=1
ORDER by t1.id desc

select t1.id "id", t1.parent_id "parentId", t1.plate_name_son "plateName", t1.create_time "createTime", t1.update_time "updateTime" from hw_plate_son t1
where 1=1
and t1.parent_id=#{id}
ORDER by t1.id desc
mapper.update: update hw_plate_parent set plate_name=#{plateName} where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select b.student_name "studentName", a.id "id",
score "score",
sum(score) "score",
b.student_id "studentId", teacher_belong "teacherId", belong_plate "belongPlate"
from hw_plate_score a right join hw_student b on a.student_belong = b.student_id
and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and YEARWEEK(date_format(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(date_format(#{createTime},'%Y-%m-%d'))
and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m') = date_format(#{createTime},'%Y-%m')
where 1=1
and student_name like CONCAT(#{studentName},'%')
group by a.belong_plate,b.student_name,b.student_id,teacher_belong
group by a.belong_plate,b.student_name,b.student_id,teacher_belong
mapper.insert: insert into hw_plate_score (belong_plate, score, student_belong, create_time, teacher_belong, week_count, month_count, term_count) values (#{belongPlate},#{score},#{stuBelong},NOW(),#{teaBelong},#{weekCount},#{monthCount},#{termCount})
mapper.update: update hw_plate_score set score = #{score} where student_belong=#{user}
